a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Population growth rate with and without migration, United States
The annual change in population with migration included, versus the change if there was zero migration (neither
emigration or immigration). The latter therefore represents the change in population based solely on domestic births
Data source: United Nations, World Population Prospects (2022)
